title: Bug 109718: Large content in text item causes tips to be displayed in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips should be shown in the given format
Actual Result: Tips are shown in one line
SR:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Insert a text item into the layout
2. Enter the following content in the text item: 
   "Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMENTDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4 CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7"
3. Save the layout
4. Put the mouse cursor on the text item
